content: I'm in the city of Oakdale. We'd like to avoid downtown and the highway. We're familiar with the bike trail along the river, so if possible, it'd be great to incorporate that into the route. The terrain is generally flat with some small hills. Oh, and by the way, I just got back from a charity 5K run last weekend and was happy to beat my personal best time - shaved off about a minute and a half from my previous record!
